m_descr:
This module combines multiple actors and temperature sensors to form a thermostat. The actor will be turned on off depending on the temperatures measured, a setpoint defined by the thermostat. Additionally this module checks for opened windows and ensures pauses between and maximum length of heating intervals.
Check github.com/maros/Zway-AdvancedThermostatDevice for detailed documentation.
max_time_helper: Max device run time (in minutes, optional)
pause_time_helper: Minimin pause time after device has been switched off (in minutes, optional)
switch_helper: Switch to turn on/off the thermostat operation. If no device is set this module will create a virtual switch.
temperature_sensors_helper: Multiple temperature sensors. If multiple sensors are set the average temperature will be weightet by the update times of the sensors
thermostat_helper: A virtual thermostat device. If no device is set this module will create a virtual thermostat widhet.
window_sensors_helper: Will stop heating or cooling if an open window was detected
